snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Tuesday's selections include Microsoft hiring a former Sony executive to oversee its Xbox developers in Europe and a venture capitalist's take...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar news. Tuesday's selections include Microsoft hiring a former Sony executive to oversee its Xbox developers in Europe and a venture capitalist's take on Yahoo's patent lawsuits against Facebook.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Making Highlight Work, and News Link Symbols
